title: SAP Consultant Trainee (Fresh Graduate Program)
qualified: Functional Consultant will be responsible for configuring Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution based on SAP Functionalities through:
• Analysis of business requirement
• Discussion with the client to improve their business processes
• Configuration of an SAP system based on client's requirement
• Training and knowledge transfer delivered to the client
• Conversion and data upload into the system

Technical Consultant will work hand-in-hand with functional analysts and key users in delivering the customized solutions, modified functionalities, report development, conversions, output, and interfaces.
